meanings.definition: The quality or state of being faddish
meanings.sent1: Her faddishnesses in clothing choices made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The faddishnesses of the latest diet craze quickly faded away.
meanings.sent3: His faddishnesses for wearing mismatched socks always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: The faddishnesses of social media influencers can sway the opinions of many.
meanings.sent5: The faddishnesses of neon colors in the '80s left a lasting impact on fashion trends.

meanings.definition: The tendency to follow fads or trends
meanings.sent1: She couldn't resist the faddishnesses of buying the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent2: The faddishnesses of celebrity endorsements often influence consumer behavior.
meanings.sent3: His faddishnesses for collecting limited edition sneakers knew no bounds.
meanings.sent4: The faddishnesses of viral challenges on social media can be entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent5: The faddishnesses of fast fashion contributes to environmental concerns.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being fashionable or trendy
meanings.sent1: The faddishnesses of her outfit caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: In the world of fashion, faddishnesses can change rapidly.
meanings.sent3: His faddishnesses for retro styles made him a trendsetter among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The faddishnesses of high-waisted jeans made a comeback in recent years.
meanings.sent5: The faddishnesses of minimalist design can be seen in modern architecture.
